'''''Misteriosa Forma Del Tiempo''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category [[Wonders of the World]]. To complete the achievement, the player needs to complete the puzzle and ring the bell in [[Portus Anticus]].

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is probably a reference to {{w|Jorge Luis Borges}}' poem [https://www.poeticous.com/borges/otro-poema-de-los-dones?book=52/ {{es|Otro poema de los dones}}], which ending line defines music as the mysterious shape of time.
